Buzachi Oil LLP

Buzachi Oil LLP — is an independent oil and natural gas exploration, development and production company.

Now about the products

Gasoline

High-octane fuel, obtained through the distillation of crude oil. It is a key component in the automotive industry, ensuring high engine performance and emission cleanliness.

fuel oil

Heavy fuel, derived from more viscous petroleum fractions. It is used in thermal power plants, heating, and industrial processes. Production involves vacuum distillation and hydroprocessing.

oil

"The raw material extracted from underground deposits undergoes complex processing to extract valuable hydrocarbons. It serves as the primary source for the production of gasoline, diesel, heavy oil, and liquefied gas."

High-octane fuel, obtained through the distillation of crude oil. It is a key component in the automotive industry, ensuring high engine performance and emission cleanliness.

Let's talk about the company

Mission

Supporting the stable recovery of the national economy, rising living standards and prosperity in the region.

Target

Become a trusted supplier of crude oil and gas to both local and international natural resource markets.

Values

Work in an environmentally friendly manner, promote ethical, honest and responsible decision making, safety.

Strategy

The strategy of Buzachi Oil LLP is to act responsibly at any level: operational, corporate and social. The management of our Company will maintain high standards of corporate policy, which is ensured by a set of basic principles.
